overview: Cassy is a hot new indie film director with an inflated ego and an aggressive libido. When she hires Lauren, a smart and experienced theater director, as her assistant director, sparks fly. Although Lauren may not have an ounce of film experience, she knows how to tell a story -- a skill her director hasn't quite perfected. As the director and her A.D. find a creative balance together, both the film and the budding romance begin to show great potential.
title: Outtakes
